name: kidown.io
description:
You can play here: http://www.kidown.io

kidown.io is a multiplayer game in which your goal is to eliminate your opponent and trying to get the high score.

kidown.io is inspired by NS-SHAFT which was my favorite game when I was a child but I cannot find it anymore. So I built one but multiplayer version it also mobile friendly. Hope you guys can join me and play with me and wanted to see if you had any advice on how to continue to get better and grow. Thanks and appreciate any insights.

HOW TO PLAY kidown.io

right arrow: move right

left arrow: move left

QWE: use emotes
